duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and supervise the activities of the Shared Services Accounts Payable department, ensuring accuracy of invoice entry and timeliness of payments while providing quality customer service to internal & external customers.
Provide training, guidance, & leadership to a growing Shared Services AP department servicing at least 9 Fuji companies nationwide.
Manage the processing of 20K+ invoices per month for 8 companies utilizing 3 different computer systems, including credit card payments and ACH’s payments for vendors.
Work cooperatively with staff from various companies and teams to assure all accounts payable are compliant and processed timely.
Maintain reports and procedures as required for periodic reporting.
Educate internal & external customers through good presentation skills.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in business administration, accounting, finance, or related field or equivalent experience.
